DOC.brief_summary: How daily consumption pomegranate juice affect concentration , morphology motility sperm healthy men .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Evaluate Effect Pomegranate Juice Semen Parameters Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: To determine , pilot study , whether daily consumption pomegranate juice ( POM ) affect concentration , morphology motility sperm healthy men . The purpose present pilot study examine hypothesis POM may improve semen parameter men .
DOC.criteria: 12 healthy men age 1840 normal sperm count History undescended testis surgery scrotal content , History marijuana alcohol abuse , hot tub usage least 3 month prior entry study No alpha adrenergic medication within two week entry study , No anabolic steroid use , No anticholinergic antimuscarinic drug , use colchicine , cimetidine , sulfasalazine , antipsychotic , antidepressant , immunosuppressive drug prior use chemotherapeutic drug , UTI screen visit .
